ctrlX OS License - OPC UA Pub/Sub
OPC UA Pub/Sub is the OPC extension for real-time C2C communication for ctrlX OS

scopes-declaration.opcuapubsub.view.desc:
- Read access to all OPC UA Pub/Sub related Data Layer nodes. 
- View web UI with OPC UA Pub/Sub configurations and states.
